name: EventItemPickup
description: This event is fired when the player picks up an item from the ground.
overview:
Backed by class `EventItemPickup`. 

Behavior:
* Fires when the player picks up items from the ground
* Includes items dropped by players, mobs, or blocks
- The `item` field contains the picked up item and its count
* Not cancellable
* Useful for tracking item collection and inventory management

Event Payload:
* item (ItemStackHelper): The item that was picked up. This provides access to all item properties like name, count, enchantments, damage, etc.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
